about_the_game:
A merging of dissociation between dream worlds.
Lost in nightmares. Find your way through the desolate worlds, happy dreams and hidden horrors.

Top-Down exploration merged with 2D platforming exploration.
Random encounters with mini-puzzle based battle systems.
Explore a large variety of top-down environments
Collect items & power-ups.
Traverse a large variety of platforming landscapes.
Switch between overlapping mirror worlds.
Solve a large variety of puzzles
Find hidden secrets
Survive all threats.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content that includes topics regarding mental illness and associated issues regarding a wide variety of mental illnesses that may be regarded as mature in nature.

This game aesthetic design contains pixelated blood & gore.

name: Dissociative

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 GB available space
